tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name TEXT,
  preference_category TEXT,
  preference_value TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  preference_category VARCHAR,
  preference_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_type VARCHAR,
  supplier_id INT,
  strategy_description TEXT,
  strategy_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerPreferences (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  preference_1 VARCHAR(100),
  preference_2 VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE OrderHistory (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerPreferences(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles ( 
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    customer_name TEXT, 
    customer_email TEXT, 
    preference1 INT, 
    preference2 INT 
);

CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (
  purchase_id INT NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  purchase_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY(purchase_id),
  FOREIGN KEY(customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerPreferences(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SupplyChain (
  supply_id INT NOT NULL,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
  supply_quantity INT,
  supply_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY(supply_id),
  FOREIGN KEY(product_id) REFERENCES ProductInventory(product_id),
  FOREIGN KEY(supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);
